SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM,A.* FROM(SELECT BOARD_NO ,M.USER_ID ,CATEGORY_NO ,TITLE ,COUNT ,B.CREATE_DATE ,AC.REF_PNO ,INSURANCE_TYPE ,REGION ,LIKED ,REPORT_COUNT ,B.STATUS ,PART_NAME ,LM.USER_NAME FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON (BOARD_WRITER = M.USER_NO)
JOIN ACCIDENT AC ON(BOARD_NO=AC.REF_BNO) JOIN LAW_USER L ON (L.LAW_NO=REF_LNO) JOIN MEMBER LM ON (LM.USER_NO=REF_UNO) JOIN PART_CATEGORY ON (AC.REF_PNO = PART_NO) WHERE CATEGORY_NO = ? ORDER BY B.CREATE_DATE DESC)A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
